nutrition_header_subtitle: Boost your health with smart nutrition and learn your ideal weight range
tip1_description: Fill half your plate with colorful veggies to pack in fiber, vitamins, and minerals.
tip2_description: Drink at least 2-3 liters of water daily to keep your energy and digestion on point.
tip3_description: Support your muscles by adding lean meats, eggs, dairy, or legumes to every meal.
tip4_description: Swap white rice and bread for brown rice, oats, and whole grain pasta for better fiber.
tip5_description: Include carbs, proteins, and healthy fats in your meals. Don‚Äôt fear any group.
tip6_description: Minimize sweets and sugary drinks. Choose fruits or dark chocolate instead.
tip7_description: Incorporate avocados, nuts, and olive oil to support brain and heart health.
tip9_description: Even healthy food can lead to weight gain if portions are too large. Be mindful.
tip10_description: Prepping meals in advance helps you stay on track and avoid unhealthy choices.
bmi_calculator_description: Enter your weight and height to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI).
choose_plan_subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your fitness goals and budget
membership_plans_description: We offer flexible options to suit every fitness journey. All plans include access to our world-class facilities and basic amenities.
equipment_access_description: State-of-the-art cardio and strength equipment from leading brands like Life Fitness and Hammer Strength.
group_classes_description: Over 50 weekly classes including yoga, HIIT, spin, and more included with Premium and Elite memberships.
expert_staff_description: Certified trainers and nutritionists available to help you reach your goals (additional fees may apply for Basic members).
pool_spa_description: Access to our Olympic-sized pool and spa facilities (available with Premium and Elite memberships).
faq_q1: What's included in the membership fee?
faq_a1: All memberships include access to our facilities during operating hours, locker rooms, and basic amenities. Higher tiers include additional benefits as listed.
faq_a2: Yes, you can freeze your membership for up to 3 months per year for medical reasons or travel. A small monthly maintenance fee applies during freezes.
faq_a3: We offer 15% discounts for students with valid ID. Please bring your ID when signing up.
faq_a4: You can cancel anytime with 30 days notice. No long-term contracts required.
contact_call_us: Call us: +1 (555) 123-4567 to speak with a membership specialist
contact_visit_us: Visit us: 123 Fitness Street, Health City, HC 12345
contact_hours: Our team is available Monday-Friday 8AM-8PM and Saturday 9AM-4PM to answer your questions.
supplements_hero_title:
Unlock Your Potential:
The Complete Supplement Guide
supplements_hero_subtitle: Empowering you with knowledge for optimal well-being and proper supplement usage.
supplements_intro_description: Discover the key supplements that can support your health journey. Each entry provides clear, concise information on recommended use and important restrictions.
supplement_d3_use: 1000-4000 IU daily with a meal containing fats for better absorption.
supplement_d3_restrictions: Avoid excessive doses (>10,000 IU/day) without medical supervision. May interact with certain medications.
supplement_magnesium_use: 200-400 mg daily, preferably in glycinate or citrate form. Take in the evening for better sleep.
supplement_magnesium_restrictions: May cause diarrhea at high doses. Caution for those with kidney disease.
supplement_c_use: 500-1000 mg daily, especially during cold and flu season or for immune support.
supplement_c_restrictions: High doses can cause digestive upset. Avoid if you have kidney stones or hemochromatosis.
supplement_fish_oil_use: 1000-2000 mg of EPA+DHA daily. Take with food to reduce fishy burps.
supplement_fish_oil_restrictions: May increase bleeding risk, consult doctor if on blood thinners. Can cause upset stomach.
supplement_probiotics_use: 10-50 billion CFUs daily, ideally on an empty stomach or with food as directed by product.
supplement_probiotics_restrictions: Mild digestive discomfort initially. Consult doctor if immunocompromised or critically ill.
supplement_creatine_use: 3-5g daily, monohydrate form, with water. Can be taken any time of day.
supplement_creatine_restrictions: Ensure adequate hydration. Caution for those with kidney issues, consult doctor.
supplement_ashwagandha_use: 300-600 mg of root extract daily, often taken before bed for stress relief.
supplement_ashwagandha_restrictions: May interact with thyroid medications, sedatives. Avoid if pregnant or breastfeeding.
supplement_glucosamine_use: 1500 mg Glucosamine, 1200 mg Chondroitin daily. Take with meals.
supplement_glucosamine_restrictions: May interact with blood thinners. Not recommended for shellfish allergies if from shellfish source.
supplement_coq10_use: 100-200 mg daily, especially for those on statin medications. Take with food.
supplement_coq10_restrictions: Generally well-tolerated. May interact with blood thinners and blood pressure medications.
supplement_bcomplex_use: One capsule daily with food, preferably in the morning for energy support.
supplement_bcomplex_restrictions: Generally safe. High doses of certain B vitamins may cause mild side effects.
supplement_digestive_enzymes_use: Take with meals to aid digestion and nutrient absorption.
supplement_digestive_enzymes_restriction: May cause digestive upset in some. Consult doctor if you have ulcers or pancreatitis.
supplement_turmeric_use: 500-1000 mg daily, with black pepper for enhanced absorption, for anti-inflammatory support.
supplement_turmeric_restrictions: May interact with blood thinners. Caution for those with gallstones or liver issues.
supplement_zinc_use: 15-30 mg daily, typically with food to prevent nausea, for immune support.
supplement_zinc_restrictions: High doses can lead to copper deficiency. May interact with certain antibiotics.
supplement_bcaas_use: 5-10g before, during, or after workouts for muscle recovery.
supplement_bcaas_restrictions: Generally safe. Ensure proper balance with other amino acids for optimal benefit.
supplement_rhodiola_use: 200-600 mg daily, typically in the morning, for stress and fatigue.
supplement_rhodiola_restrictions: May cause insomnia if taken late. Consult doctor if on antidepressants or blood thinners.
supplements_footer_disclaimer: Disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes only and should not be considered medical advice. Always consult your healthcare provider before starting any new supplement regimen or making changes to your existing one.
